review: Much better than my Chrome, but the chrome connects to WiFi better.

review: This product rocks! It loads quickly and has so many options! We will be purchasing more in the future. Thanks Amazon!

review: Love Love Love this stick.  Bought it to use on an old plasma tv to get Netflix.  Works flawlessly.  Very pleased with it.

review: So easy to use.  This is really what you expect from Plug and play.  The only drawback is that now we also subscribed to Netflix so it is costing me.  All kidding aside this is a great product.
